data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Nord-Trøndelag, Norway today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nord-Trøndelag, Norway

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Nord-Trøndelag. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 10,764 believers in Nord-Trøndelag that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Nord-Trøndelag access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, 0.1% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Please, convict the 10,764 believers in Nord-Trøndelag, Norway to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the people of the the state of Nord-Trøndelag to be consumed with longing for your Word at all times, like David.
data.verse: My soul is consumed with longing for your laws at all times.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nord-Trøndelag, Norway has a population of 135,200.

We estimate Nord-Trøndelag has 10,764 people who might know Jesus, 107,344 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,092 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Nord-Trøndelag, Norway with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
